== Description ==
Encodes text for use inside a <code><textarea></code> element.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php esc_textarea( $text ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$text|string|The text which is to be encoded.}}

== Return Values ==
; (string) : The encoded text with HTML entities.

Since: 3.1
